Class Scene

java.lang.Object
cs3318.group22.raytrace.src.Raytrace.Scene
public class Scene extends Object
A class representing a Raytracing Scene.

    • saveRenderedImage

      public final void saveRenderedImage(String filePath) throws IOException
      Output rendered image to current working directory in PNG format.
      Parameters:
      filePath - File path to store the output image file.
      Throws:
      IOException - If unable to write file to specified location in the file system.

    • saveRenderedImage

      public final void saveRenderedImage() throws IOException
      Overload method. Output rendered image to ./out.png in PNG format, if the filePath not provided.
      Throws:
      IOException - If unable to write file to specified location in the file system.

    • renderImage

      public final void renderImage()
      Take all the configurations and render the scene to the image.
